string.name: emailConfirm_click
string.comment:
emailConfirm_click
Part of the confirmation email upon registering for a Lichess account.
The unique reset link is presented just after this string.

resources.string: Klik pautan untuk mengaktifkan akaun Lichess anda:
Jika anda tidak berdafter bersama Lichess, anda boleh abaikan sahaja mesej ini.
Tetapkan semula kata laluan lichess.org anda, %s
